thread.title: Excellent stay at a gem of a hotel!
thread.title_full: Excellent stay at a gem of a hotel! - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: CurtinOrla
title: Excellent stay at a gem of a hotel!
text: Just back from a wonderful stay at The Grosvenor. Super location beside Victoria station and walking distance to lots of attractions. Staff were lovely and very hard working. Would highly recommend this hotel and will definitely stay here again next time in London. We travelled from Gatwick so it could not be handier.
